Description:
In Kaspersky's 2020 Incident Response Analyst Report they listed legitimate tool "Mouse Lock" as being used for both credential access and collection in security incidents.

Author: Cian Heasley
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PUA - Mouse Lock Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where product like '%mouse lock%' and company like '%misc314%' and command like '%mouse lock_%'
